alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 6:47PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Montgomery and southeastern Chautauqua Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 646 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Chautauqua, or 10 miles south of Sedan, moving northeast at 20 mph. Wind gusts near 60 mph have been reported with this storm near Chautauqua. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Caney, Tyro, Peru, Chautauqua, Havana and Niotaze. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
